TEXT.English: Hidden Attitude
TEXT.French: Hidden Attitude
TEXT.German: Verborgene Modifikatoren
TEXT.Italian: Hidden Attitude
TEXT.Spanish: Actitud Oculta
TEXT.Finnish: Hidden Attitude

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die verborgenen Beziehungsmodifikatoren anderer Oberhäupter an (möglicher Spoiler)
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los modificadores de las actitud oculta (posible spoiler).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).

TEXT.English: Worst Enemy
TEXT.French: Worst Enemy
TEXT.German: Erzfeind
TEXT.Italian: Worst Enemy
TEXT.Spanish: Peor Enemigo
TEXT.Finnish: Worst Enemy

TEXT.English: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.French: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.German: Zeigt den Erzfeind jedes Gegenspielers an, wenn der Mauszeiger über desssen Symbol bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el peor enemigo de cada IA rival se muestra en el texto que aparece cuando se sitúa el ratón encima de su icono.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.

TEXT.English: Defensive Pacts
TEXT.French: Defensive Pacts
TEXT.German: Verteidigungsbündnisse
TEXT.Italian: Defensive Pacts
TEXT.Spanish: Acuerdos Defensivos
TEXT.Finnish: Defensive Pacts

TEXT.English: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.French: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Verteidigungsbündnisse jedes Gegenspielers an, wenn der Mauszeiger über desssen Symbol bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, los Acuerdos de protección de cada IA rival se muestra en el texto que aparece cuando se sitúa el ratón encima de su icono.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.

TEXT.English: Longitude / Latitude
TEXT.French: Longitude / Latitude
TEXT.German: Längengrad / Breitengrad
TEXT.Italian: Longitudine / Latitudine
TEXT.Spanish: Longitud / Latitud
TEXT.Finnish: Longitude / Latitude

TEXT.English: When checked, the longitude and latitude are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centered the map.
TEXT.French: When checked, the longitude and latitude are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centered the map.
TEXT.German: Zeigt bei zentrierter Karte den Längen- und Breitengrad eines Geländefeldes an, wenn der Mauszeiger darüber bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono mostrate longitudine e latitudine posizionando il cursore su una casella, dopo aver centrato la mappa.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, la longitud y la latitud de una casilla se muestra en el texto que aparece cuando se sitúa el ratón encima de la casilla.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the longitude and latitude are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centered the map.

TEXT.English: Working City
TEXT.French: Working City
TEXT.German: Bearbeitende Stadt
TEXT.Italian: Working City
TEXT.Spanish: Working City
TEXT.Finnish: Working City

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Geländefeld im Bereich mehrerer Städte bewegt wird, an, welche Stadt es kontrolliert (erscheint in Cyan, falls es auch bearbeitet wird)
TEXT.Italian: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.

TEXT.English: Recommended Build
TEXT.French: Recommended Build
TEXT.German: Empfohlene Bauten
TEXT.Italian: Recommended Build
TEXT.Spanish: Recommended Build
TEXT.Finnish: Recommended Build

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein eigenes Geländefeld bewegt wird, die Modernisierungen oder Straßen an, die ein automatisierter Bautrupp errichten würde
TEXT.Italian: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.

TEXT.English: Partial Builds
TEXT.French: Partial Builds
TEXT.German: Unvollständige Bauten
TEXT.Italian: Costruzione parziale
TEXT.Spanish: Mejoras Parciales
TEXT.Finnish: Partial Builds

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a tile that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a tile that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Geländefeld mit teilweise fertig gestellten Bauten (Modernisierungen, Straßen und Waldrodungen) bewegt wird, an, wie viele Runden ein Bautrupp noch benötigt, um sie fertig zu stellen, wenn der Bautrupp diese Aktionen beherrscht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, posizionare il cursore su una casella che contiene costruzioni (miglioramenti, strade, eccetera) parzialmente completate mostrerà quanti turni di lavoro sono necessari per completare l'opera.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a tile that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hovering over a tile that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.

TEXT.English: Upgrade Name
TEXT.French: Upgrade Name
TEXT.German: Modernisierung berücksichtigen
TEXT.Italian: Aggiornamento del nome
TEXT.Spanish: Nombre Actualizado
TEXT.Finnish: Upgrade Name

TEXT.English: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.French: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.German: Falls der Einheitentyp im Namen einer Einheit vorkommt, wird dieser bei einer Modernisierung mit der neuen Bezeichnung ersetzt (beispielsweise wird aus "Schwertkämpfer 5 aus London" dann "Axtkämpfer 5 aus London")
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, se il nome di una Unità contiene il suo tipo (p. es. "Arciere I di Roma"), questo viene rimpiazzato dal nuovo tipo quando l'Unità viene aggiornata (p. es. "Balestriere I di Roma").
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, si el nombre de una unidad contiene su tipo (e.g. "Arquero 5 de Londres"), se reemplaza por el nuevo tipo cuando se actualiza (e.g. "Ballestero 5 de Londres").
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").

TEXT.English: Starting Experience
TEXT.French: Starting Experience
TEXT.German: Anfangserfahrung
TEXT.Italian: Starting Experience
TEXT.Spanish: Starting Experience
TEXT.Finnish: Starting Experience

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Erfahrungspunkte und die Anzahl möglicher Beförderungen, die eine neue Einheit erhalten wird, im Tooltip des Schalters "Einheit ausbilden" an.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.

TEXT.English: Starting Experience Modifiers
TEXT.French: Starting Experience Modifiers
TEXT.German: Anfängliche Modifikatoren für Erfahrung
TEXT.Italian: Starting Experience Modifiers
TEXT.Spanish: Starting Experience Modifiers
TEXT.Finnish: Starting Experience Modifiers

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Modifikatoren für Erfahrungspunkte (Gebäude, Militärausbilder, Staatsformen und Wunder) im Tooltip des Schalters "Einheit ausbilden" an.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.

TEXT.English: Building
TEXT.French: Building
TEXT.German: Gebäude
TEXT.Italian: Edifici
TEXT.Spanish: Edificio
TEXT.Finnish: Building

TEXT.English: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.French: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die tatsächlichen Erträge von [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], ICON_GREATPEOPLE] und [ICON_DEFENSE] an, die ein Gebäude für eine Stadt erzeugt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Gebäudesymbol bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa degli Edifici della Città viene mostrata la resa effettiva in [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] e [ICON_DEFENSE] prodotta dagli edifici stessi.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el aporte de [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], y [ICON_DEFENSE] que el edificio otorgara a la ciudad se muestra en el texto que aparece al pasar el ratón sobre el edificio.
TEXT.Finnish: WWhen checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.

TEXT.English: Speeds Up ...
TEXT.French: Speeds Up ...
TEXT.German: Beschleunigt ...
TEXT.Italian: Accelera ...
TEXT.Spanish: Speeds Up ...
TEXT.Finnish: Speeds Up ...

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry would be shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry would be shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.German: Zeigt Technologien an, die durch das Vorhandensein der Technologie beschleunigt würden, über der sich der Mauszeiger befindet (beispielsweise würde "Tierzucht" bei "Landwirtschaft" erscheinen, wenn bereits "Jagd" erforscht wäre)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa di una Tecnologia vengono mostrate le Tecnologie che risultano accelerate dall'acquisizione della Tecnologia in questione (p. es. una volta acquisita la tecnologia 'Caccia', se posizionerete il cursore sulla tecnologia 'Agricoltura' vi verrà ricordato che questa accelererà la tecnologia 'Allevamento di animali').
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra las tecnologías que se desbloquearan adquiriendo la tecnología sobra la que estas pasando el ratón (e.g. Ganadería se mostrara para Agricultura una vez ya tengas Caza).
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry would be shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).

TEXT.English: Technology Trade Denial
TEXT.French: Technology Trade Denial
TEXT.German: Verweigerung von Technologien
TEXT.Italian: Rifiuto di commercio di Tecnologie
TEXT.Spanish: Vetos al Comercio de Tecnologías
TEXT.Finnish: Technology Trade Denial

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gründe für die Verweigerung eines Handels an, wenn der Mauszeiger über eine Technologie in der Spalte "Unverhandelbar" auf der Seite "Technologien" des Auslandsberaters bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, posizionando il cursore su una Tecnologia nella colonna 'Non commercia' della pagina delle Tecnologie del Consigliere Estero verrà visualizzata la ragione per cui l'AI rifiuta di commerciare tale Tecnologia.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, pasando el ratón por encima de una tecnología en la columna de "No Comercia" en la Página de Tecnología en el Consejero de Exteriores te mostrar la razón por la IA no comercia esa tecnología.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: Resource Trade Denial
TEXT.French: Resource Trade Denial
TEXT.German: Verweigerung von Ressourcen
TEXT.Italian: Rifiuto di commercio di Risosre
TEXT.Spanish: Vetos al Comercio de Recursos
TEXT.Finnish: Resource Trade Denial

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gründe für die Verweigerung eines Handels an, wenn der Mauszeiger über eine Ressource in der Spalte "Unverhandelbar" auf der Seite "Ressourcen" des Auslandsberaters bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, posizionando il cursore su una Risorsa nella colonna 'Non commercia' della pagina delle Risorse del Consigliere Estero verrà visualizzata la ragione per cui l'AI rifiuta di commerciare tale Risorsa.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, pasando el ratón por encima de un recurso en la columna de "No Comercia" en la Página de Recursos en el Consejero de Exteriores te mostrar la razón por la IA no comercia ese recurso.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: Commerce Subtotals
TEXT.French: Commerce Subtotals
TEXT.German: Einkommen mit Zwischensummen
TEXT.Italian: Subtotali del Commercio
TEXT.Spanish: Subtotales de Comercio
TEXT.Finnish: Commerce Subtotals

TEXT.English: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip jeder Einkommensart eine Zwischensumme (Gesamtertrag vor Modifikatoren) an, falls dies erforderlich ist
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa di ogni tipo di Commercio viene mostrato (quando necessario) il relativo subtotale (il totale prima dei modificatori).
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, se muestra el subtotal (total antes de los modificadores) para cada tipo de comercio cuando se pasa el ratón por encima de ellos.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.

TEXT.English: Rate Breakdown
TEXT.French: Rate Breakdown
TEXT.German: Aufschlüsselung der Rate
TEXT.Italian: Natalità dei Grandi Personaggi
TEXT.Spanish: Progreso Grandes Personajes
TEXT.Finnish: Rate Breakdown

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip die [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]/Runde für jede einzelne Art Große Persönlichkeit an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa di ogni tipo di Grande Personaggio viene mostrato il tasso individuale di [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] per turno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra el incremento por turno de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] para cada tipo cuando se pasa el ratón por encima de ellos.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.

TEXT.English: Maintenance
TEXT.French: Maintenance
TEXT.German: Unterhaltskosten
TEXT.Italian: Mantenimento
TEXT.Spanish: Mantenimiento
TEXT.Finnish: Maintenance

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf die Unterhaltskosten ([ICON_GOLD]) haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano il mantenimento ([ICON_GOLD]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a los costes de mantenimiento ([ICON_GOLD]) y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.

TEXT.English: Food
TEXT.French: Food
TEXT.German: Nahrung
TEXT.Italian: Cibo
TEXT.Spanish: Alimentos
TEXT.Finnish: Food

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_FOOD]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la crescita alimentare ([ICON_FOOD]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_FOOD] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: Production
TEXT.French: Production
TEXT.German: Produktion
TEXT.Italian: Produzione
TEXT.Spanish: Producción
TEXT.Finnish: Production

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_PRODUCTION]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la produzione ([ICON_PRODUCTION]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_PRODUCTION] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: Commerce
TEXT.French: Commerce
TEXT.German: Einkommen
TEXT.Italian: Commercio
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio
TEXT.Finnish: Commerce

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_COMMERCE]/Runde, [ICON_GOLD]/Runde, [ICON_RESEARCH]/Runde, [ICON_CULTURE]/Runde und [ICON_ESPIONAGE]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la crescita commerciale ([ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD]), scientifica ([ICON_RESEARCH]), culturale ([ICON_CULTURE]) e spionistica ([ICON_ESPIONAGE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], y [ICON_ESPIONAGE] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: Health
TEXT.French: Health
TEXT.German: Gesundheit
TEXT.Italian: Salute
TEXT.Spanish: Salubridad
TEXT.Finnish: Health

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_HEALTHY]/Runde und [ICON_UNHEALTHY]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la situazione sanitaria ([ICON_HEALTHY] e [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_HEALTHY] y [ICON_UNHEALTHY] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: Happiness
TEXT.French: Happiness
TEXT.German: Zufriedenheit
TEXT.Italian: Felicità
TEXT.Spanish: Felicidad
TEXT.Finnish: Happiness

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_HAPPY]/Runde und [ICON_UNHAPPY]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano il gradimento ([ICON_HAPPY] e [ICON_UNHAPPY]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_HAPPY] y [ICON_UNHAPPY] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: Great People
TEXT.French: Great People
TEXT.German: Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Grandi Personaggi
TEXT.Spanish: Grandes Personajes
TEXT.Finnish: Great People

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la natalità dei Grandi Personaggi ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: City Defense
TEXT.French: City Defense
TEXT.German: Stadtverteidigung
TEXT.Italian: Difesa città
TEXT.Spanish: Defensa de Ciudad
TEXT.Finnish: City Defense

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_DEFENSE] einer Stadt und ihren Schutz gegen Bomabardierungen haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la natalità dei Grandi Personaggi ([ICON_DEFENSE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, muestra los edificios que afectan a [ICON_DEFENSE] de la ciudad y de bombardeo y por cuanto.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.

TEXT.English: Draft Unit Details
TEXT.French: Draft Unit Details
TEXT.German: Zwangsrekrutierung (Info)
TEXT.Italian: Draft Unit Details
TEXT.Spanish: Draft Unit Details
TEXT.Finnish: Draft Unit Details

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt alle Informationen über die Einheit an, die in einer Stadt rekrutiert werden kann, wenn der Mauszeiger über die entsprechende Schaltfläche im Stadt-Bildschirm bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.

TEXT.English: Draft Limit
TEXT.French: Draft Limit
TEXT.German: Zwangsrekrutierung (Obergrenze)
TEXT.Italian: Draft Limit
TEXT.Spanish: Draft Limit
TEXT.Finnish: Draft Limit

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Einheiten an, die in dieser Runde rekrutiert werden können, und ob eine Stadt bereits rekrutiert hat, wenn der Mauszeiger über die entsprechende Schaltfläche im Stadt-Bildschirm bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.

TEXT.English: Whip Button
TEXT.French: Whip Button
TEXT.German: Zwangsarbeit-Schaltfläche
TEXT.Italian: Bottone dei sacrifici
TEXT.Spanish: Botón de Sacrificio
TEXT.Finnish: Whip Button

TEXT.English: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip der Schaltfläche für den Einsatz von Zwangsarbeit zur Produktionsbeschleunigung den Überschuss an ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_GOLD]), der durch deren Einsatz erzeugt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il testo a comparsa del Bottone dei Sacrifici mostra il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e [ICON_GOLD]) generato dall'accelerazione mediante sacrifici.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el texto que se muestra cuando se pasa el ratón por encima del botón de sacrificio incluye el exceso de ([ICON_PRODUCTION] y [ICON_GOLD]) que se crea cuando se sacrifica población.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.

TEXT.English: Include Current
TEXT.French: Include Current
TEXT.German: Aktuelle Runde einbeziehen
TEXT.Italian: Includi corrente
TEXT.Spanish: Incluir Actual
TEXT.Finnish: Include Current

TEXT.English: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.French: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.German: Bezieht [ICON_PRODUCTION]/Runde einer Stadt aus der aktuellen Runde in die Berechnung des Produktionsüberschusses ein, da der Einsatz von Zwangsarbeit normalerweise die Rate beeinflusst und damit auch den tatsächlichen Überschuss verändern kann
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il calcolo del surplus da sacrifici include il tasso di produzione ([ICON_PRODUCTION]) corrente. Poichè l'accelerazione solitamente influenza tale tasso, il surplus effettivo può differire da quello mostrato.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el exceso de producción al sacrificar población incluye la [ICON_PRODUCTION] actual. Dado que sacrificar población normalmente afecta al ratio de producción, el exceso real puede ser diferente.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.

TEXT.English: Remove Specialist Button
TEXT.French: Remove Specialist Button
TEXT.German: "Spezialist entfernen"-Schaltfläche
TEXT.Italian: Bottone rimozione Specialisti
TEXT.Spanish: Botón Quitar Especialista
TEXT.Finnish: Remove Specialist Button

TEXT.English: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.French: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip der Schaltfläche "Spezialist entfernen" dieselben Informationen über einen Spezialisten an wie bei der Schaltfläche "Spezialist hinzufügen"
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il testo a comparsa del Bottone di rimozione degli Specialisti include le stesse informazioni mostrate da quello del Bottone di aggiunta degli Specialisti.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el texto que se muestra cuando se pasa el ratón por encima del botón de quitar especialista incluye la misma información que en el botón de añadir especialista.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.

TEXT.English: Zoom to City Details
TEXT.French: Zoom to City Details
TEXT.German: Zur Stadt zoomen
TEXT.Italian: Bottone di Zoom Cittadino
TEXT.Spanish: Botón de Zoom a la Ciudad
TEXT.Finnish: Zoom to City Details

TEXT.English: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip der Schaltfläche "Zur Stadt zoomen" dieselben ausführlichen Informationen an, wie wenn der Mauszeiger über einen Stadtbalken auf der Karte bewegt würde
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, il testo a comparsa del Bottone di Zoom Cittadino nella schermata del 'Consigliere Interno' include informazioni dettagliate sulla Città, come quelle visualizzate quando si posiziona il cursore sulla Barra Cittadina sulla mappa.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando se activa, el botón de Zoom a la Ciudad incluye información detallada sobre la ciudad igual que cuando se pasa el ratón por encima de la barra de ciudad en el mapa.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.

TEXT.English: Health Effects from Features
TEXT.French: Health Effects from Features
TEXT.German: Gesundheitseffekte von Gelände
TEXT.Italian: Health Effects from Features
TEXT.Spanish: Health Effects from Features
TEXT.Finnish: Health Effects from Features

TEXT.English: When checked, the hover text for any Worker action that will remove a feature with health effects (e.g. Forest or Jungle) will list the effect on each nearby city.
TEXT.French: When checked, the hover text for any Worker action that will remove a feature with health effects (e.g. Forest or Jungle) will list the effect on each nearby city.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip jeder Aktion eines Bautrupps, die eine Geländeeigenschaft mit Einfluss auf die Gesundheit von Städten entfernen würde (beispielsweise Wald oder Dschungel), die entsprechenden Auswirkungen auf nahegelegene Städte
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the hover text for any Worker action that will remove a feature with health effects (e.g. Forest or Jungle) will list the effect on each nearby city.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the hover text for any Worker action that will remove a feature with health effects (e.g. Forest or Jungle) will list the effect on each nearby city.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the hover text for any Worker action that will remove a feature with health effects (e.g. Forest or Jungle) will list the effect on each nearby city.

TEXT.English: Consider Other Workers
TEXT.French: Consider Other Workers
TEXT.German: Andere Bautrupps einbeziehen
TEXT.Italian: Consider Other Workers
TEXT.Spanish: Consider Other Workers
TEXT.Finnish: Consider Other Workers

TEXT.English: When checked, the effect of removing a feature on each nearby city will take into account Workers performing actions that will remove a feature from other tiles.
TEXT.French: When checked, the effect of removing a feature on each nearby city will take into account Workers performing actions that will remove a feature from other tiles.
TEXT.German: Bezieht in die Anzeige der Gesundheitseffekte die Aktionen anderer Bautrupps ein, die ebenfalls Geländeeigenschaften entfernen
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the effect of removing a feature on each nearby city will take into account Workers performing actions that will remove a feature from other tiles.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the effect of removing a feature on each nearby city will take into account Workers performing actions that will remove a feature from other tiles.
TEXT.Finnish: When checked, the effect of removing a feature on each nearby city will take into account Workers performing actions that will remove a feature from other tiles.
